name: IRecipeContainer
description: This interface is to be implemented on Container objects. For GUIs with recipe books, this allows their containers to have recipe completion and ghost recipes in their craft matrices.

methods.name: getCraftResult
methods.description: The crafting result slot of your container, where you take out the crafted item. The equivalent for CraftingMenu is CraftingMenu#resultSlots . The equivalent for InventoryMenu is InventoryMenu#resultSlots .

methods.name: getCraftMatrix
methods.description: The crafting matrix of your container, where ingredients go for crafting. The equivalent for CraftingMenu is CraftingMenu#craftSlots . The equivalent for InventoryMenu is InventoryMenu#craftSlots .
